name: Retro Shooter Rampage Bundle
description:
If you thought you’ve played every iconic retro FPS, think again. This collection of famous – and infamous – Retro Shooters brings the goods with tons of baddie-blasting mayhem. Mow down your enemies through sci-fi, horror, realistic, and fantastical settings to find every key, flip every switch, and uncover every secret. Give that itchy trigger finger a thorough scratch with these action-packed romps!

Corridor 7
A gateway linking our world with another has been opened deep within a top-secret research lab, allowing an invasion of hostile alien forces to come pouring through. Venture deep into the dark and twisting test chambers of Corridor 7 to combat a hostile takeover of Earth in this alien blasting FPS!

Operation Body Count
Capstone Software’s classic first-person shooter is back! You are a member of Elite Force, a highly trained unit called in to take back the U.N. building from terrorists. Battling your way to the last floor in one piece is a tall order, but there’s no stopping until those hostages are free.

Killing Time
A sophisticated shooter laced with gallows humor. Killing Time is no shallow grave. Its depth is well-conceived. Puzzle solving and strategic thinking are placed at a premium.

Last Rites
"We are food, but not for long." The Zombie apocalypse has come, and your squad is the last line of defense. Command a Special Forces unit with high-tech weaponry in this mission-based FPS with sprawling indoor and outdoor environments.
